name: things-dxt
description: Claude Desktop Extension for Things, the award-winning personal task manager
long_description: This extension provides seamless integration between Claude Desktop and Things task manager through AppleScript automation. Create, manage, and organize your tasks directly from Claude conversations. Features include creating to-dos, projects, areas, tags, and managing your task workflow efficiently.

tools.name: create_todo
tools.description: Create a new to-do item in Things

tools.name: create_project
tools.description: Create a new project in Things

tools.name: create_area
tools.description: Create a new area in Things

tools.name: complete_todo
tools.description: Mark a to-do as completed in Things

tools.name: show_item
tools.description: Show a specific item in Things

prompts.name: plan_day
prompts.description: Help plan your day with Things tasks
prompts.text: Help me plan my day by reviewing my current tasks in Things. Show me what's on my today list, upcoming tasks, and suggest a prioritized plan for the day.

prompts.name: review_tasks
prompts.text: Let's review and organize my current tasks in Things. Show me my inbox, overdue items, and help me organize them into appropriate projects and areas.
